price: 113. Hun verrekening is slechts bij mijn Heer, als jullie dat (maar) wisten.
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
